name: Spectrum Brands RAY-OT3DLN-B Rayovac Sportsman Indestructible Lantern

reviews.name: Rayovac Outdoor Indestructible Lantern, 400 Lumens
reviews.reviewText:
this lantern lives up to it's name,it is very high quality construction in my opinion,
Rayovac puts out a lot of good quality flashlights and camping lanterns,I really like
their products,one thing that does need to be corrected,Walmart's description of this lantern
says it runs for 280 hours on high,this is not correct,it will run on low for 280 hours
reviews.title: Indestructible

reviews.name: Rayovac Outdoor Indestructible Lantern, 400 Lumens
reviews.reviewText: Buy the Ozark lantern if you want a bright light, the Rayovac is not that bright.
reviews.title: Not as bright as I thought it would be.

reviews.name: Rayovac Outdoor Indestructible Lantern, 400 Lumens
reviews.reviewText: I was a little optimistic at first but after using the lantern on several fishing and camping trips it has made me a believer. Tough as nails and very bright with great battery life.
reviews.title: This product may be small but it's big on features.

reviews.name: Rayovac Outdoor Indestructible Lantern, 400 Lumens
reviews.reviewText: I am amazed with the brightness of this lantern. We used it when we went clam digging at the ocean and it was easy to carry and we had no fear that it would get wet and stop working. We use it at night when we take our dog out. But the biggest reason that we bought it is for power outages because we can use it to see and read and it will last for so long . Excellent value and I would recommend highly.
reviews.title: Highly Recommend the ray o vac 400 lumen lantern

reviews.name: Rayovac Outdoor Indestructible Lantern, 400 Lumens
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with the entire line of indestructible lights, here's just another great light when you need one!.
reviews.title: Entire line
